fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night you may choose one player, their vote will count as 0 for the following day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You start off aligned with Town or against them.
-Every day your alignment changes to be with or against the Town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be aligned with the winning faction on the day the game ends.
